full_output.summary: Experienced in data analysis and Front End Web Development. Proficient in extracting insights from complex datasets, I excel in transforming raw data into actionable intelligence using advanced tools. Seeking opportunities to contribute my skills to innovative, data-driven projects.

projects.name: Blogging Website
projects.description: Developed an innovative blogging website utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP to ensure a seamless user experience with an attractive and responsive design. Implemented dynamic features using JavaScript for an engaging user environment and PHP for a robust backend, facilitating efficient data management and secure user authentication.

projects.name: IPL Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed IPL match data till 2019 using Python and data visualization, extracting insights on match outcomes, team performance, and player contributions. Proficient in data manipulation and utilizing visualization libraries (pandas, numpy, matplotlib, seaborn) to deliver comprehensive and insightful analyses.

experiences.description: Gained experience in data visualization and communication skills by creating charts, graphs and presentations to deliver findings to stakeholders. Worked in a Government Tender Project regarding installation of CCTV cameras.
Utilized API keys to integrate third-party services and data sources into LangChain applications. Analyzed and interpreted data to improve prompt performance and model accuracy.

full_output.name: Aryaman Sarmah
